title: 服务器卡顿，后台疯狂刷屏
author: Xiaoxinzhi
txt_content:
卡顿时的Timings报告：https://timings.aikar.co/?id=80be6318063343688adc2126adeb661e
经过了我的思考...只要开船就会有以下提示，无论服务器是否卡顿，在卡顿的情况下也出现。
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!
f716ca4d-36cb-4ca8-9795-f199fcfb214a (vehicle of san) moved wrongly!复制代码目前知道是在spigot.yml中设置阀门：
  moved-wrongly-threshold: 0.00625
  moved-too-quickly-multiplier: 10000复制代码请问怎么禁用？ 设置0/-1？设置-1没用。请大佬解答。

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
设置为0试试吧，不行就设置999999

可以使用这个插件屏蔽
